name: It's Not Real (dwfdev)
description:
You are an aspiring writer working on your newest project, this one is to get your foot in the door, to make a name for yourself, but your creative ambition often clashes with your home office job and responsibilities which chip away at your very being, it's really messing with your head.

Just remember, it's not real.

This is our team's(Sequence Break) submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2022. We thought about what we wanted to do for the theme, with certain themes resonating with us.

Support for Linux and Windows included

Audio Credits:

"Anguish" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Sound effects gathered from freesound.org and zapsplat.com
